overview:
What We Do

The core of our business is PPC Campaigns Management. We have been part of Tradaâ€™s team of Optimizers for one year now and we have honed our business senses in that field. Our hands-on experience in the Online Marketing Industry allows us to offer reliable and realistic PPC Campaigns.

By taking into account promotional methods such as Search Engine Search Strategies (SES), Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) Conversion Performance Optimization (CPO), Web Marketing Optimization (WMO) and Web Performance Optimization (WPO) we identify userâ€™s goals and based on that information we recommend website owners what to do in order to drive high quality traffic to their transactional websites and enhance their Web Performance and Conversion Rates.

We have created RealTime PPC Campaign Watch. In a nutshell, we will intervene the customersâ€™ campaigns as often as itâ€™s required, depending on the plan our they purchase in order to keep them running as smoothly as possible. We offer our customers a personalized, 24/7 service that includes the techniques, methods and tools necessary to overcome the usual web page woes: poor visibility, bad performance, unclear value proposition (and even worse: all of the above).

Our projects address key aspects of the Internet Marketing Industry, for instance: Online Marketing (Internet/Digital Marketing), Online Advertising, Online Presence and Performance, Search Engine Optimization, PaaS, Creation and Development of Digital Assets, ebusiness/m-business integration and more. Our final goal is to provide simple and powerful online solutions for the marketing needs of the Small Business sector at affordable prices.
